alert.logout: Invalid credentials, please log in again.

reset.description: With this command you can reset the database with the only remaining entity will be the admin.
reset.confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset the database?
reset.error: Error during reset. Try again later.

clear.description: With this command you can clear the database and refill with the initial data.
clear.confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear the database?
clear.error: Error during cleaning. Try again later.

delete.description: With this command you can delete any exercise.
delete.error: Error during deletion. Try again later.

email.title: Email
email.security: We'll never share your email with anyone else.

result.error: Error during login. Try again later.

reset.title: Reset password
reset.error: Error during change. Try again later.

sequence.title: Number of sequences
sequence.details: The number of how many times should the user repeat the exercise

delay.title: The delay (in seconds) between moments
delay.details: The delay (in seconds) between the moments of the exercise

video.title: The video identifier of the exercise
video.details: The 11 character long YouTube id, for instance 'dQw4w9WgXcQ'

name.title: The name of the exercise
name.details: The name of the exercise that will be resolved in the client application

details.title: The details of the exercise
details.details: The details of the exercise that will be resolved in the client application

results.error: Error during upload. Try again later.

arm.firstHalf: Angle between the right forearm and the right upper arm
arm.firstFull: Angle between the right upper arm and the shoulders line
arm.secondHalf: Angle between the left forearm and the left upper arm
arm.secondFull: Angle between the left upper arm and the shoulders line
arm.distance: Distance between the end of the arms relative to a unit. The unit is the distance between the hip line and the shoulders line

leg.firstHalf: Angle between the right calf and the right thigh
leg.firstFull: Angle between the right thigh and the hips line
leg.secondHalf: Angle between the left calf and the left thigh
leg.secondFull: Angle between the left thigh and the hips line
leg.distance: Distance between the end of the legs relative to a unit. The unit is the distance between the hip line and the shoulders line

error.title: The description of the error
error.type: Whether the error should appear with a match with the arms or the legs
error.firstHalf: Angle between the right forearm and the right upper arm or the right calf and the right thigh
error.firstFull: Angle between the right upper arm and the shoulders line or the right thigh and the hips line
error.secondHalf: Angle between the left forearm and the left upper arm or the left calf and the left thigh
error.secondFull: Angle between the left upper arm and the shoulders line or the left thigh and the hips line
error.distance: Distance between the end of the arms or legs relative to a unit. The unit is the distance between the hip line and the shoulders line
